structure.unit: ARTICLE F. - TRANSIENT OCCUPANCY TAX; CONVENTION AND VISITORS BUREAU
Sec. 2-2087. - ALLOCATION OF NET PROCEEDS COLLECTED.

law.text: The City Manager shall allocate and distribute the net proceeds collected by the tax as mandated by Chapter 850 of the Session Laws of 1985 and as provided in the budget approved by the City Council. (Ord. No. 1986-825A, ยง1, 7-15-86)
